name: Enigmatis Collection
summary:
The highly acclaimed Artifex Mundi trilogy is now available as a bundle! Become a private detective and investigate a mysterious cult in Maple Creek. Follow in the footsteps of the sinister Preacher and explore the foggy Ravenwood Park – a place that harbors more secrets than meets the eye. Travel to the breathtaking Karkhala and figure out a way to find and destroy the mysterious source of evil. 
 
This bundle includes: 
Enigmatis: The Ghosts of Maple Creek 
Enigmatis 2: The Mists of Ravenwood 
Enigmatis 3: The Shadow of Karkhala
